tool_description: Translate from any language to another using this simple api
name: Translate text to any language
title: Translate text to any language

api_list.name: Translate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-text-to-any-language.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-text-to-any-language.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-text-to-any-language.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-text-to-any-language.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
